content.raw:
I don't know if we have a policy for placing templated method definitions but we could put it outside of the body class declaration (just after it). How it is now we are implicitly asking the compiler to inline it (by including the definition together with the declaration inside the class body) which given the method size probably is not going to happen anyway.

I've made the change in the branch `publisher_class_jrivero`, just in case that you want to consider it.
content.html:
I don't know if we have a policy for placing templated method definitions but we could put it outside of the body class declaration (just after it). How it is now we are implicitly asking the compiler to inline it (by including the definition together with the declaration inside the class body) which given the method size probably is not going to happen anyway.

I've made the change in the branch publisher_class_jrivero, just in case that you want to consider it.
